alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Pope; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 8:12PM CDT until April 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Conway County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Happy Bend, or 12 miles east of Russellville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morrilton... Greenbrier... Atkins... Pottsville... Wooster... Damascus... Twin Groves... Bethlehem... Hill Creek... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... Catholic Point... Hattieville... Middleton... Lanty... Mallet Town... Whipple... Springhill... St. Vincent... Blick... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 86 and 105. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.
